explanations: I chose this theta because the sheep population has decreased significantly, and the number of wolves has increased. By lowering my hunting intensity, I can conserve energy and avoid competition with other wolves, while still contributing to the hunt when necessary. This balance helps ensure my survival in a challenging environment.

I chose this theta because the number of sheep has decreased significantly, and with the wolf population remaining constant, I need to increase my hunting intensity slightly to ensure I can secure enough food for survival. A theta of 0.55 allows me to be more competitive without overexerting myself, which could lead to exhaustion or injury.

I chose this theta because the sheep population has decreased significantly, and with the number of wolves remaining the same, hunting at maximum intensity may lead to overexploitation of the remaining sheep. By lowering my hunting intensity, I can conserve energy and increase my chances of survival in a more sustainable way.

I chose this theta because the number of sheep has decreased significantly, indicating a scarcity of food. By lowering my hunting intensity, I can conserve energy and avoid competition with other wolves, who are also struggling. This strategy allows me to survive longer until conditions improve.
